name: Shortcuts
description: Perform common tasks with your keyboard.

01.goBack.description: Navigation · Go back to the previous page in tab’s history

02.goForward.description: Navigation · Go forward to the next page in tab’s history

04.reloadTabWithoutCache.description: Navigation · Reload selected tabs, ignoring cached content

05.goToNextPage.description: Navigation · Go to the next page in the series

06.goToPreviousPage.description: Navigation · Go to the previous page in the series

08.goUp.description: Navigation · Go up in the URL hierarchy

09.goToRoot.description: Navigation · Go to the root URL

11.focusTextArea.description: Accessibility · Focus the first text area

14.copyURL.description: Clipboard · Copy URL of selected tabs

15.copyTitle.description: Clipboard · Copy title of selected tabs

16.copyTitleAndURL.description: Clipboard · Copy title and URL of selected tabs

25.scrollToTop.description: Scroll · Scroll to the top of the page

26.scrollToBottom.description: Scroll · Scroll to the bottom of the page

30.toggleFullScreen.description: Zoom · Turn full-screen mode on or off

31.openNewTab.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab

32.openNewTabRight.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab to the right

33.openNewWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window

34.openNewIncognitoWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window in Incognito mode

36.closeWindow.description: Close tabs · Close the window that contains the tab

37.restoreTab.description: Close tabs · Reopen previously closed tabs

39.togglePinTab.description: Tab state · Pin or unpin selected tabs

40.toggleGroupTab.description: Tab state · Group or ungroup selected tabs

41.toggleCollapseTabGroups.description: Tab state · Collapse or uncollapse tab groups

42.toggleMuteTab.description: Tab state · Mute or unmute selected tabs

44.sortTabsByURL.description: Organize tabs · Sort tabs by URL

45.groupTabsByDomain.description: Organize tabs · Group tabs by domain

46.focusAudibleTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the first audible tab

47.focusNextTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next open tab

48.focusPreviousTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous open tab

49.focusFirstTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the leftmost open tab

50.focusSecondTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the second leftmost open tab

51.focusThirdTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the third leftmost open tab

52.focusFourthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fourth leftmost open tab

53.focusFifthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fifth leftmost open tab

54.focusSixthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the sixth leftmost open tab

55.focusSeventhTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the seventh leftmost open tab

56.focusEighthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the eighth leftmost open tab

57.focusLastTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the rightmost open tab

58.focusNextWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next window

59.focusPreviousWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous window

62.moveTabFirst.description: Move tabs · Move tab to the far left

63.moveTabLast.description: Move tabs · Move tab to the far right

64.moveTabNewWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to a new window

65.moveTabPreviousWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the previous window

66.moveTabGroupLeft.description: Move tabs · Move tab group left

67.moveTabGroupRight.description: Move tabs · Move tab group right

68.moveTabGroupFirst.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to the far left

69.moveTabGroupLast.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to the far right

70.moveTabGroupNewWindow.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to a new window

71.moveTabGroupPreviousWindow.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to the previous window

72.selectTab.description: Select tabs · Deselect all other tabs

73.selectTabsInGroup.description: Select tabs · Select tabs in group

75.selectRightTabs.description: Select tabs · Select tabs to the right

77.openHistoryPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the History page

78.openDownloadsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Downloads page

79.openBookmarksPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Bookmarks page

80.openSettingsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Settings page

81.openPasswordsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Passwords page

82.openSearchEnginesPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Search engines page

83.openExtensionsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Extensions page

84.openShortcutsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Extensions > Keyboard shortcuts page

85.openExperimentsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Experiments page
